Name: Indicate limits
Question: I know my limits and indicate these clearly and tactfully
Description: I know my limits and indicate these clearly and tactfully.

Name: Able to handle conflicts
Question: I can handle and solve differences of opinion in a tactful way.
Description: I can handle and solve differences of opinion in a tactful way

Name: Confront with
Question: I can address someone respectfully on his/her behaviour, so that he/she becomes aware of that behaviour (and the effect thereof on others).
Description: I can address someone respectfully on his/her behaviour, so that he/she becomes aware of that behaviour (and the effect thereof on others).

Name: Stating your opinion
Question: I can visualise a clear opinion for myself and like to pass it on well-founded.
Description: I can visualise a clear opinion for myself and like to pass it on well-founded.

Name: Hold discussions
Question: During discussions I take up such a position that because of my preparation, structuring and way of acting the final objective is achieved with mutual agreement.
Description: During discussions I take up such a position that because of my preparation, structuring and way of acting the final objective is achieved with mutual agreement.

Name: Present, communicate clearly
Question: I can clearly, and with motivation, pass on an idea or range of ideas to others.
Description: I can clearly and motivated pass on an idea or range of ideas to others.

Name: Listen
Question: I not only hear what people say, I also listen to what others say. For me it is more important to understand than to be understood.
Description: I not only hear what people say, I also listen to what others say. For me it is more important to understand than to be understood.

Name: Able to express oneself verbally
Question: If I say something, mostly everyone understands what the purpose and contents of my message are.
Description: If I tell something, mostly everyone understands what the purpose and contents of my message are.

Name: Able to express oneself in writing
Question: If I write something, mostly everyone understands what the purpose and contents of my message are.
Description: If I write something, mostly everyone understands what the purpose and contents of my message are.

Name: Provide feedback
Question: When asked for, and unasked-for, I provide feedback in a positive way on the positive or negative functioning or behaviour/attitude to someone.
Description: When asked for and unasked-for I provide feedback in a positive way on the positive or negative functioning or behaviour/attitude to someone.
